MidiEffects.Description: The second of two reverb engines available on the Ventris Dual Reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: Control1
EffectDetails.Description: Custom control 1 particular to reverb mode.

EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Outboard Spring mode.

EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates playing in an enclosed dome.

EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates an echo reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: Hall

EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Offspring mode.

EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Offspring mode.

EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates a metal box reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: MetallicMix
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Plate mode.

EffectDetails.Name: ModVerb
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates a modulated reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: Offspring
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates an offspring reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: Outboard Spring
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates an outboard spring reverb.

EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Shimmer mode.

EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Shimmer mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Plate
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates a plate reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelay
EffectDetails.Description: The delay time between the dry signal and the onset of the reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelayFeedbackHighCut
EffectDetails.Description: Sets the pre-delay feedback high cutoff frequency.

EffectDetails.Name: PreDelayFeedbackLowCut
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for multiple modes.

EffectDetails.Name: Quantize
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for LoFi mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Reverse
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates a reverse reverb.

EffectDetails.Description: One of two reverb engines available on the Ventris Dual Reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: ReverbEngineB
EffectDetails.Description: The second of two reverb engines available on the Ventris Dual Reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: Room
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates playing in a standard room-sized space.

EffectDetails.Name: Shimmer
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates a shimmer reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: Swell
EffectDetails.Description: A reverb effect that simulates a swell reverb.

EffectDetails.Name: SwellTime
EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for Swell mode.

EffectDetails.Name: Time
EffectDetails.Description: Sets min and max delay times.

EffectDetails.Description: Effect setting for ModVerb mode.
